text: The 2010 All Thailand Golf Tour is the 12th season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2010 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !! Women's winner |- | 31 Jan || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|3,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Lam Chih Bing || Thidapa Suwannapura (a) |- | 2 May || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club (C-D) || align=right|1,600,000 || align=center|– || Udorn Duangdecha || align=center|– |- | 18 Jul || Singha E-San Open || Singha Park Khon Kaen Golf Club || align=right|1,600,000 || align=center|– || Thaworn Wiratchant || align=center|– |- | 4 Sep || B-Ing TPC Championships || Bangpra Golf Club || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Udorn Duangdecha || Chayuda Singhsuwan |- | 26 Dec || Singha Classic || Rancho Charnvee Country Club || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Prayad Marksaeng || Tanaporn Kongkiatkrai |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2010 All Thailand Golf Tour
